name: Bite Delight
description:
Disclaimer: With pressing the game play button you accept our data protection regulations, we will save your highscore with the given username on a cloud server provided by Playfab (https://playfab.com/)

Are you a vampire? Have you ever dreamed of terrorizing a hospital with your gruesome bites? Do you suffer from uncontrollable bloodloss? Then Bite Delight is the right game for your next night! Run through randomized environments, progress to new levels and avoid dying by gathering lots of blood from your local hospital visitors!

Note:
Controller not supported in WebGL Version.
Download Version here: https://gamejolt.com/games/BiteDelight/411338

Developed for Ludum Dare 44 by:
Marcel Zurawka
Julius Krüger
Felix Kosian
Lars Hinnerk Grevsmühl
